All functions

add_predictions

Add black box predictions to generated dataset

check_for_na

Alert user if NAs are present

create_task

Create regression or classification task.

fit_explanation

Fit white box model to the simulated data.

generate_neighbourhood

LIME: sampling for local exploration

give_predictions

Add predictions to generated dataset.

live

live: visualizing interpretable models to explain black box models.

plot_explanation

Plotting white box models.

plot_regression

Watefall plot or forestplot for lm/glm explanations.

prepare_forestplot

Draw a forest plot with proper annotations.

sample_locally

Generate dataset for local exploration.

set_constant_dates

Set date values to one value

winequality_red

Red wine characteristics and quality.
